title: What can I do with my IT degree in audio music industry? - Quora
tags: Jobs and Careers in Information Technology

response.answer_text: You can do worlds, if you're good at it.If you have looked into, or used, or come across softwares like Steinberg Cubase (developed by Steinberg), Guitar Rig (Native instruments), Addictive Drums (XLN Audio) and the likes, you'll have an idea of how immense the effect of software has been on the audio industry. The recording technology has changed completely with the advent of software.All hardware functions are now being replicated through software, be it effects pedals, compressors, equalisers, everything! So frankly speaking, you have an ocean in front of you!
